short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your gateway to a world of images. Streamline your search and download high-quality pictures effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover and Download Media Effortlessly:
This extension lets you freely download images and videos in multiple formats, including SD, HD, and Full HD.

Key Features:
- Search and download high-quality images and videos with ease.
- Save your favorite photos and videos for later use.
- Explore curated collections of photos and videos, perfect for your projects or inspiration.
- Enjoy all content for free, with simple usage rules (see https://www.pexels.com/license).
- All images and videos are provided by Pexels (https://www.pexels.com).

Start exploring and make the most of this powerful tool for your media needs!
